name: Wit Innovation Technologies
tag_list: iphone, android, mac, blackberry, windows, web, -net, php, databses, javascript, ajax, flex, development, mobile-apps, applications, programmers, mobile-coders
overview: Wit Innovation Technologies is a Leading Bangalore based mobile software development company having expertise in Mac, iPhone, Blackberry, Android, Windows Phones & Web 2.0 Platform (PHP, ROR, Zend Framework, Flex, Ajax, JavaScript, HTML & CSS) Wit Innovation is established since 2006 having worked with clients across Geographies including US, Canada, Germany, Austria, Australia, Spain, Italy, Venezuela, Saudi Arabia and India. It has a strong customer base with more than 80% of repeat customers. Highly skilled and motivated workforce with low turn over. Ready Infrastructure and Development and Test Servers in India Strong backup facilities for internet connections. Effective web based collaboration tools for transparent project monitoring and management by customer. Having worked for marquee clients like Microsoft, HP and SAP in India.
